articles.title: How to track your order
articles.content: To track: open Orders > select the order > click 'Track'. You will receive carrier updates. If tracking doesn't update for more than 3 days, contact support with your tracking number.

articles.title: Cancel or return an order
articles.content: If your order hasn't shipped, you may cancel from Orders > Details > Cancel. For returns, check the Returns policy and submit a return request; include order id and reason.
